Class Booster

java.lang.Object
greenfoot.Actor
Fruit
Booster
public abstract class Booster extends Fruit
A booster is a special item that cannot be formed during the game. It helps players clear the board by providing various advantages. Boosters are only activated when game level is greater than 0.
Version:
June 2024
Author:
Vanessa Huo
